name: Sonic Pixel Perfect
overview: Sonic 1 Pixel Perfect is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis byil JclFerg Zone layout (with edited boss) as of the first beta release.gy and NovaWizard. The hack features new extended layouts and art, custom loops and tubes, dynamic palettes for the acts, and a complete new Green Hill Zone layout (with edited boss) as of the first beta release.
